mapper.select: select ta.class_no, ta.class_notice_no, ta.class_nm_s, ta.class_notice_title, ta.mid, ta.class_hw_no, ta.class_hw_file,ta.class_hw_type, ta.class_notice_date, ta.class_notice_content from ( SELECT c.class_no, c.class_nm_s, c.TUTOR_ID as mid, h.class_hw_no,h.class_hw_file,h.class_hw_file_type as class_hw_type,n.class_notice_no,n.class_notice_title,n.class_notice_date,n.class_notice_content FROM class c, class_notice n, class_hw h where c.class_no = n.class_no and n.class_notice_no = h.class_notice_no(+)) ta where ta.class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}

select ta.class_no,ta.class_notice_no, ta.class_nm_s, ta.class_notice_title, ta.mid, ta.class_hw_no, ta.class_hw_file,ta.class_hw_type, ta.class_notice_date, ta.class_notice_content from ( SELECT c.class_no,c.class_nm_s, c.TUTOR_ID as mid, h.class_hw_no,h.class_hw_file,h.class_hw_file_type as class_hw_type,n.class_notice_no,n.class_notice_title,n.class_notice_date,n.class_notice_content FROM class c, class_notice n, class_hw h where c.class_no = n.class_no and n.class_notice_no = h.class_notice_no(+)) ta where ta.class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}

select ta.class_no,ta.class_notice_no, ta.class_nm_s, ta.class_notice_title, ta.mid, ta.class_hw_no, ta.class_hw_file,ta.CLASS_HW_TYPE, ta.class_notice_date, ta.class_notice_content from ( SELECT c.class_no,c.class_nm_s, c.TUTOR_ID as mid, h.class_hw_no,h.class_hw_file,h.CLASS_HW_FILE_TYPE as CLASS_HW_TYPE ,n.class_notice_no,n.class_notice_title,n.class_notice_date,n.class_notice_content FROM class c, class_notice n, class_hw h where c.class_no = n.class_no and n.class_notice_no = h.class_notice_no) ta where ta.class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}
select count(*) from class_notice where class_no=#{class_no}
mapper.update: update CLASS_NOTICE set class_notice_title=#{class_notice_title}, class_notice_content=#{class_notice_content}, class_no=#{class_no} where class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}
update CLASS_HW set CLASS_HW_FILE=#{class_hw_file}, CLASS_HW_FILE_TYPE=#{class_hw_type} where class_notice_no=#{class_notice_no}
